name: Alicia Chen
summary: A seasoned Data Analyst with a background in finance, specializing in SQL. Proven track record of leveraging data to drive strategic decision-making and optimize business performance.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Senior Data Analyst
experience.description: Led the development of predictive models using SQL to enhance risk assessment, resulting in a 15% reduction in non-performing loans.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Automated data cleansing processes, increasing operational efficiency by 20% and ensuring data accuracy for regulatory reporting.

projects.name: Risk Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Developed an interactive dashboard to visualize credit risk trends, enabling stakeholders to make informed lending decisions. Tools: Tableau, SQL.

projects.name: Portfolio Optimization Model
projects.description: Built a model to optimize investment portfolios based on risk-return profiles, leading to a 10% increase in ROI. Tools: Python, Excel.
